summary:
This is a player house called Thane\'s Ridge. Not too big, not too small- fits perfectly :D
Now with milkable cows !!!
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
It\'s my first Skyrim mod so please endorse if you like it or let me know if you doesn\'t  :D 
This is a Thane\'s Ridge- custom player house. Not too big, not too small- fits perfectly :D

Location
========
It\'s located in front of the Whiterun, next to Chillfurrow Farm.

Details
=======
Big area around the house where you can find cow, 4 chickens, terrace with oven (hearthfire ver.), big farmland with fertile soils where your plants can grow ( hearthfire), stable for your horse ( access through chillfurrow farm), fishing area, training dummies, archery target.

Inside the house you can find many weapon racks, display shelves, 3 mannequins, kitchen with butter churn and mead barrels (hearthfire), study, small display place, smithing room, enchanting and alchemy lab, bedroom, plenty of storage and more ! :D  

Install
=======
1. Use NMM or extract the archive to the Skyrim data directory.


Uninstall
=========
1. Use NMM or delete .esp and .bsa file


Incompatibility
===============
It can be incompatible with mod Smash It Up - Functional Mills. The windmill can disappear.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
I didn\'t notice any issues but if there is something please let me know. (in comment section)

History
=======
1.0-initial release
1.1-
-Fixed minor bugs
-added milkable cows
-added navmesh (to make house companion friendly, finally ! )
-added few more containers.


To do list
==========
-(maybe) add new room

Contact
=======
You can send me an e-mail to this adress- jockmods@gmail.com



Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator
Creation Kit
Modders Resource Pack
Open Books Resource
Food Container Resource
Book Set Resource
Potion Shelf Resource
Berts Hearthfire Dairy Resources for Modders

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask you to give me endorse if you like it or if u used it. :D 
                                                    PLEASE ENDORSE !!!! :D
author: JockAlone2k
